about_the_game:
Take classic top-down control of the destiny of a Buh as he makes his way through an adventurous retro wave world populated by many other Buhs.

Explore

Glitch throught the interconnected levels on the hexagonal grid world. Figure out how the grids are connected and get into areas no Buh has ever seen before.

Quests

Accomplish quests for different types of Buhs to unlock new skills and items.

Trade

Find the mysterious game store owner: Sell the junk you find on the different grids and try to get a good deal on the games he offers.

Fight

Fight the evil Buhs with your Nano Sword 2000 and grap their mojo to find out what happened to them.

Highscore

Try to reach the central grid to become the one and only choosen Buh for the highest of all known highscores.

...and have fun!

name: World of Buh

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: yes
  • Graphics: yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Take control of the destiny of a Buh as he makes his way through an adventurous retro wave world populated by many other Buhs. Some may help you to find what's this all about... but most of them will try to get in the way and do what only the one and only choosen of the Buhs can do.
